channel.title: Some SQL help
channel.description: Ok, so i'm going to add SQL to my server but i need some help. I think i know enough from the java tut to add it but how can i make it so if the user isn't in the database it won't let him her login? And what code would i use to make a php pae insert the informatino into the database?
